title: PrimalMyst Act, Level, and Rank Structure

description.summary: The definitive progression structure for PrimalMyst defining the relationship between story acts, character levels, and rank progression throughout the entire game experience.
description.detailed: This structure governs all content access, progression gating, and narrative pacing across PrimalMyst. Each act has specific level ranges and corresponding rank requirements that control what content players can access and when major story beats occur.

rank_progression.description: Hidden E rank throughout tutorial, revealed upon completion

progression_gates.exit: Achieve visible E rank and select starting divine island

act_1.name: Divine Trials - Proving Worthiness

rank_progression.description: Visible rank progression through divine trial completion

key_content: Divine Acknowledgment Tremor (+6 monster level per trial)

progression_gates.entry: E rank and divine island arrival
progression_gates.mid_point: Rank C required for divine trials (level 20)
progression_gates.exit: D rank and divine positioning complete

rank_progression.description: Advanced trial access and divine realm exploration

progression_gates.entry: C rank and mainland portal access
progression_gates.mid_point: B rank required for higher-tier realm content (level 55)
progression_gates.exit: B rank and cosmic understanding achieved

rank_progression.description: Master trial completion and divine champion status

progression_gates.entry: A rank and master trial qualification
progression_gates.exit: A rank mastery and God-Slayer candidate status

epilogue.name: God-Slayer - Divine Confrontation

rank_progression.description: Ultimate divine confrontations and cosmic transcendence

key_content: SS rank achievement at level 100 only

progression_gates.final: SS rank achieved only at level 100 upon cosmic transcendence

hidden_E.name: Hidden Novice
hidden_E.description: Tutorial rank not visible to player until completion

E.name: Novice
E.description: Beginning practitioner with basic myst manipulation

D.name: Apprentice
D.content_access: Divine trials, elemental embraces, primal opposition

C.name: Journeyman
C.description: Advanced practitioner with divine positioning complete
C.content_access: Mainland access, basic divine realm exploration

B.name: Expert
B.description: Skilled in advanced trials and cosmic understanding

A.name: Master
A.description: Divine champion with master trial completion

SS.name: Cosmic Transcendent
SS.description: Ultimate achievement - reached only at level 100

level_progression.function: Determines base character capabilities and equipment access

rank_progression.function: Controls what content, trials, and areas are accessible

dual_requirements.rule: All content requires BOTH level AND rank requirements to be met
examples: Level 20 + Rank C = Divine trials access
Level 55 + Rank B = Higher-tier realm content

special_cases.ss_rank: Only achievable at level 100 through cosmic transcendence
special_cases.hidden_e: Not visible to players during tutorial phase
special_cases.divine_trials: Rank C minimum required regardless of level

related_systems.divine_trials: Gated by rank requirements and level minimums
related_systems.divine_positioning: Established in Act 1, enhanced in Act 2
related_systems.monster_scaling: +6 level increase per divine trial completion
related_systems.equipment_access: Both level and rank requirements for all gear
